Class Street

java.lang.Object
Street
public class Street extends Object
This class keeps all building data in street

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Street(int length)
    Constructor initializes building ArrayLists with street length, and initializes street positions to false because of there is no building

  • Constructor Details

    • Street

      public Street(int length)
      Constructor initializes building ArrayLists with street length, and initializes street positions to false because of there is no building
      Parameters:
      length - street length for one side

  • Method Details

    • checkCollision

      public boolean checkCollision(Building building)
      Checks collision with specific location while adding a building
      Parameters:
      building - building that will add
      Returns:
      boolean expression, if there is collision returns true

    • addBuilding

      public void addBuilding(Building building)
      adds new building to ArrayList according to type of building
      Parameters:
      building - building that will add

    • deleteBuilding

      public void deleteBuilding(int position, char side)
      deletes building from ArrayList according to type of building
      Parameters:
      position - position of building that will delete
      side - side of building that will delete

    • remainingLand

      public void remainingLand(int length, boolean flag)
      Calculates remaining land at street
      Parameters:
      length - length of added/deleted building
      flag - flag gives information about that building is deleted or added

      public int displayRemainingLand()
      Returns:

      public void displayBuildings()
      Displays position, length, height and side of all building

      public int numberOfPlaygrounds()
      Returns:

      public double ratioOfPlaygrounds()
      Returns:

      finds maximum height in street

      maximum height

    • isThereBuilding

      public Building isThereBuilding(int x)
      Checks if there is a building at the given x position, if there is more than one building, it returns the larger one
      Parameters:
      x - x axis value
      Returns:
      returns building at x
